system.description:
This spell allows the caster to contact an Immortal on an outer plane to seek answers to questions. However, contact with such powerful beings carries the risk of insanity. The caster can ask a number of questions equal to the “distance” to the outer plane.

Plane Distance and Insanity: “Distance” to a plane refers to the number of planes one would need to cross to reach it. The caster may choose the distance, up to the maximum, which affects the number of questions, chance of correct answers, and insanity risk. Higher-level casters (21st and above) reduce the insanity risk by 5% per level beyond 20.

If insanity does occur, the caster requires game-time rest equal to the plane’s number to recover.

This spell can only be cast once per month.
